parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SecurityIpHosts
parameters.description:
The IP address of the ECS instance and the hostname of the Windows computer. Format: `IP address,Hostname`. Separate multiple entries with semicolon (;).

>  For more information about how to query the computer hostname, see [Configure a distributed transaction whitelist](~~124321~~).

parameters.name: WhiteListGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the IP address whitelist.
